description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，中国共产党、中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。曾担任中华人民共和国四川省第一任省长、中国共产党四川省委第一书记，中国共产党西南局第一书记兼成都军区第一政委。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, a political figure in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former leader at the Deputy State level. He served as the first governor of Sichuan Province, the First Secretary of the Sichuan Provincial Committee of the CPC, the First Secretary of the Southwest Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, and the First Political Commissar of the Chengdu Military Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党四川省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党四川省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在四川省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李井泉的第一任妻子，在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: Li Jingquan's first wife, who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 江西省立第三师范学校

zh-cn: 江西省立第三师范学校

description.zh-cn: 位于江西省的一所师范学校。
description.en: A normal school located in Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会在西南地区的派出机构。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in the Southwest region.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军主管四川、云南、贵州、西藏、重庆等省市区军事事务的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army responsible for military affairs in provinces and regions including Sichuan, Yunnan, Guizhou, Tibet, and Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 指中国在1959年至1961年期间因大跃进运动及其他因素导致的大规模饥荒。
description.en: Refers to the period of widespread famine in China from 1959 to 1961, resulting from the Great Leap Forward and other factors.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团，是中国共产党领导的先进青年的群眾组织。
description.en: The Communist Youth League of China, a mass organization of advanced youth led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党为反击国民党而发动的武装起义，标志着中共独立领导武装斗争和创建军队的开始。
description.en: An armed uprising launched by the Communist Party of China against the Kuomintang, marking the beginning of the CPC's independent leadership of armed struggle and army creation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的部队番号。
description.en: A military designation within the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事转移。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的常规军队，隶属于国民革命军序列。
description.en: A regular army led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War, nominally part of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 八路军的主力师之一。
description.en: One of the main divisions of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在抗日战争时期创办的培养军事和政治干部的学校。
description.en: A school established by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War to train military and political cadres.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第20兵团

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第20兵团

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局扩大会议和中共八届八中全会，会上对彭德怀等人进行了批判。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and the Eighth Plenary Session of the Eighth Central Committee, during which Peng Dehuai and others were criticized.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创始人和领导人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央召开的扩大的中央工作会议，旨在总结大跃进的经验教训。
description.en: An enlarged Central Work Conference convened by the CPC Central Committee to summarize the lessons learned from the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 曾长期担任毛泽东的私人秘书。
description.en: Served as Mao Zedong's private secretary for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 邓小平设立的旨在解决中共中央领导干部新老交替问题的过渡性机构。
description.en: A transitional body established by Deng Xiaoping to address the issue of succession among senior leaders of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共安徽省委第一书记，是三年困难时期安徽省饥荒的主要责任人之一。
description.en: Former First Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CPC, one of the main figures responsible for the famine in Anhui Province during the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共河南省委第一书记，是三年困难时期河南省饥荒的主要责任人之一。
description.en: Former First Secretary of the Henan Provincial Committee of the CPC, one of the main figures responsible for the famine in Henan Province during the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共山东省委第一书记，是三年困难时期山东省饥荒的主要责任人之一。
description.en: Former First Secretary of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC, one of the main figures responsible for the famine in Shandong Province during the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共甘肃省委第一书记，是三年困难时期甘肃省饥荒的主要责任人之一。
description.en: Former First Secretary of the Gansu Provincial Committee of the CPC, one of the main figures responsible for the famine in Gansu Province during the Three Years of Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的创始人和领导人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中央文化革命小组，文化大革命期间的实际最高权力机构之一。
description.en: The Central Cultural Revolution Group, one of the de facto highest authorities during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间北京航空学院的一个红卫兵组织。
description.en: A Red Guard organization at Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics during the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.target: 中国共产党四川省委员会
江西省立第三师范学校

description.zh-cn: 任四川省委第一书记期间，全力执行粮食征购任务，保障了中央及大城市的粮食供给，但导致四川省因缺粮而出现大量民众饿死的情况。
description.en: As the First Secretary of the Sichuan Provincial Committee, he fully implemented the grain procurement tasks, ensuring the grain supply for the central government and major cities, but this led to a large number of deaths from starvation in Sichuan Province due to food shortages.

description.zh-cn: 参加了南昌起义。
description.en: Participated in the Nanchang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东看中李井泉，并将其留在红一方面军工作。
description.en: Mao Zedong took a liking to Li Jingquan and kept him to work in the First Front Army of the Red Army.

position.en: Director of the Political Department of the Fourth Division

description.zh-cn: 参加了长征。
description.en: Participated in the Long March.

position.en: Political Commissar of the Fourth Division
Deputy Brigade Commander and Political Commissar of the 358th Brigade
Political Commissar of the Main School

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上紧跟毛泽东批判彭德怀。
description.en: Followed Mao Zedong closely in criticizing Peng Dehuai at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上保护李井泉，使其免于被追究在大饥荒中的责任。
description.en: Protected Li Jingquan at the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, saving him from being held responsible for his role in the Great Famine.

description.zh-cn: 在从武汉到九江的船上，田家英与李井泉谈及饿死人的问题。
description.en: On a boat from Wuhan to Jiujiang, Tian Jiaying spoke with Li Jingquan about people starving to death.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中被打倒，定性为“反党、反社会主义、反毛泽东思想的独立王国”。
description.en: Was overthrown during the Cultural Revolution and labeled as an "independent kingdom opposing the Party, socialism, and Mao Zedong Thought."

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会
中国共产党中央顾问委员会
中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上，周恩来对李井泉上调粮食救急表示赞赏，使其未被追究责任。
description.en: At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, Zhou Enlai praised Li Jingquan for transferring grain for emergency relief, which helped him avoid being held accountable.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: Persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 被贺龙、薛明夫妇视为养子。
description.en: Was regarded as an adopted son by He Long and his wife Xue Ming.

description.zh-cn: 被贺龙、薛明夫妇视为养子。
description.en: Was regarded as an adopted son by He Long and his wife Xue Ming.

description.zh-cn: 在清华大学是同学。
description.en: Were classmates at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 在清华大学是同学。
description.en: Were classmates at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 被抓进第一监狱拘留所审查。
description.en: Was detained and investigated in the No. 1 Prison Detention Center.

description.zh-cn: 批准李黎风参军。
description.en: Approved Li Lifeng's enlistment in the army.

description.zh-cn: 联名书写大字报，为刘少奇等老干部鸣冤，狠批中央文革。
description.en: Co-authored a big-character poster to protest the injustice against Liu Shaoqi and other veteran cadres, sharply criticizing the Central Cultural Revolution Group.

description.zh-cn: 部分成员批斗殴打李明清，导致其当夜心脏病发作死亡。
description.en: Some members struggled against and beat Li Mingqing, leading to his death from a heart attack that night.

description.zh-cn: 被孙志远夫妇收为养子。
description.en: Was adopted by Sun Zhiyuan and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 被张达志、申国藩夫妇收为养子。
description.en: Was adopted by Zhang Dazhi and his wife Shen Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 被张经武夫妇收为养子。
description.en: Was adopted by Zhang Jingwu and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 曾是李井泉在大青山支队的老部下。
description.en: Was a former subordinate of Li Jingquan in the Daqingshan Detachment.

description.zh-cn: 介绍杨荫梧与李井泉结婚。
description.en: Introduced Yang Yinwu to marry Li Jingquan.
